    Author:
    Alexander Veit

        Connect this connector with a server.
        Parameters:

      • getServer

        Get the server this connector is connected to.

        Start this connector.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Check if the connector is ronning.
        Returns:

        Stop this connector.
